name: Kavi Global
description:
Kavi Global is a boutique business analytics solutions company that provides full-spectrum services from imagination through delivery. Designed to fill the gap in the marketplace for comprehensive analytics services and solutions, we align our big data analytics strategies with our clients – ensuring they get the information they need to make decisions, increase profits and move ahead.
Working across many leading technologies, our comprehensive solutions automate data-driven decision making, enabling our clients to be more productive, profitable and competitive. The value we bring includes business and technology expertise, solutions delivery experience and a proven process framework for successful implementation as well as mature delivery capabilities and impressive investment in research and development. Our comprehensive services are geared towards delivering custom business solutions as well as consulting and support services across several industry-leading and open-source technologies.
With a wealth of experience in transportation, healthcare, retail, higher education, banking and government, we believe that analytically driven decisions have the power to transform businesses. We will help you make analytics a cornerstone of your corporate strategy.
